data.eml:eml: Description of two new species and redescription of one species of agnarid terrestrial isopods (Oniscidea, Agnaridae) from western Iran

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kashani, Ghasem M. (2014): Description of two new species and redescription of one species of agnarid terrestrial isopods (Oniscidea, Agnaridae) from western Iran. ZooKeys 440: 45-56, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.440.7407, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.440.7407
